name: Futurelli
description:
This is a game that I made for the TV Game Jam 2019 based on the TV show Futurama. It is a Shmup where you battle the Umicronians to deliver a package to Gamejameon V.

MUSIC:

Komiku - Battle of Pogs

This song is licensed under a Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal Liscence and is in the public domain

This song can be downloaded at http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Captain_Glouglous_Incredible_Week_Sound...

No changes were made to this song
